test_scenarios.name: Verify Homepage Availability
test_scenarios.expected_result: The Moderna homepage loads successfully, displaying the company logo, main navigation menu, and key content sections.

test_scenarios.name: Navigate to mRNA Information
steps: Open a web browser and navigate to https://www.modernatx.com.
Click on the 'Science & Technology' or equivalent navigation link.
Click on the 'mRNA Medicines' or related sub-link.
test_scenarios.expected_result: The page dedicated to explaining Moderna's mRNA technology loads successfully, displaying relevant content and media.

test_scenarios.name: Submit a Medical Information Request
steps: Open a web browser and navigate to https://www.modernatx.com.
Locate the 'Contact Us' or 'Medical Information' section (usually in the footer or main navigation).
Fill out the required fields of the contact form (Name, Email, Inquiry Type, Message).
test_scenarios.expected_result: The form is submitted successfully, and a confirmation message is displayed to the user.  The form submission is processed.
